tool.name: tool_5

param.name: VALUES
param.dialogReference:
Values

Grid list, input, optional

optional

Additional values to be collected along profile.

param.name: TABLE
param.dialogReference:
Coordinates Table

Table, input

Table with the point coordinates to query.

param.name: RESULT
param.dialogReference:
Profile

Table, output

The output table with the queried profile values.

tool.summary: The tool allows one to query a profile from an input grid (usually a DEM) for point coordinates stored in a table or shapefile. The profile is traced from one point to the next, sampling the grid values along each line segment. Optionally, additional grids can be queried whose values are added to the profile table.

(2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
